pages.text: Silkworms grow slowly over time and produce $(l:items/silk_cocoon)cocoons$().$(br2)This breed is surprisingly hostile and territorial, attacking any other nearby silkworms. $(l:creatures/silkworm#obtain)See over for obtaining them.$()

pages.name: 蠶
pages.text: You can right-click them with leaves to speed up their growth and cause them to drop more.
Silkworms do not spawn naturally, nor can they be bred, but can be hatched from eggs.$(br2)Eggs can be found by breaking leaves in the same way you would to get saplings.
